name: Mackerel With Mediterranean Vegetables
keywords: bell pepper, mackerel, tomato, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, main course
recipeIngredient: Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Poach mackerel in white wine or vermouth, almost to cover, allowing 10 minutes per inch at its thickest part. Remove from poaching liquid and cool.
Heat oil and saute peppers, garlic and onion until vegetables are soft. Add tomatoes, capers, red wine and pepper and simmer 5 minutes longer.
Spoon vegetable mixture over mackerel and serve at room temperature.
